description.narrative: The Project consists of Grupo Calidras (Calidra or the Company) investment plan to enter the Argentine market. Calidra will invest in CEFAS S.A., an important player in lime production in Argentina and realize subsequent investments for capacity expansion and operational improvements. This in turn will enable Calidra to enter the Chilean market via exports.

The following development impacts are expected to be achieved: (i) Increased competition; (ii) Sustainability; (iii) Increased productivity of local players; (iv) Efficiency in costs; and (v) Raising environmental, health, and safety standards.

name.narrative: The capital expenses related to the Project will be implemented in Argentina. Specific capital investments will be realized at several of the existing production facilities of CEFAS S.A.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.
